original_text:
You gave a wide place for my steps under me,
    and my feet did not slip.
korean_text: 내 걸음을 넓게 하셨고 나를 실족하지 않게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: You gave a wide place for my steps under me
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 내 발 아래 넓은 곳을 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and my feet did not slip.
